decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

2046_X_SP(00)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_SP(00)02_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_SP(00)03_EX_PL Revision P01, 
2046_X_GA(B1)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GA(00)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GA(01)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 
2046_X_GA(02)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(AA)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(CC)01_EX_PL Revision P01,
2046_X_GS(DD)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(EE)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(FF)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 
2046_X_GS(GG)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(HH)01_EX_PL Revision P01, 

2046_X_SP(00)01_XX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_SP(00)02_XX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_SP(00)03_XX_PL Revision P05, 
2046_X_GA(B1)01_XX_PL Revision P02, 2046_X_GA(00)01_XX_PL Revision P06, 2046_X_GA(01)01_XX_PL Revision P06, 
2046_X_GA(02)01_XX_PL Revision P03, 2046_X_GS(AA)01_XX_PL Revision P01, 2046_X_GS(BB)01_XX_PL Revision P03, 
2046_X_GS(CC)01_XX_PL Revision P06, 2046_X_GS(DD)01_XX_PL Revision P07, 2046_X_GS(EE)01_XX_PL Revision P07, 
2046_X_GS(FF)01_XX_PL Revision P06, 2046_X_GS(GG)01_XX_PL Revision P05, 2046_X_GS(HH)01_XX_PL Revision P04

Design Update Statement August 2021, Cover Letter Dated 22/10/2020, Cover Letter Dated 28/09/2020, Design and Access Statement (dated May 2017), Planning and Heritage Statement, Sustainable Design and Construction Statement, Acoustic Planning Report (ref: 1716739 dated 30/05/2017), 



REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Section 73 application to amend Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) and Condition 5 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission ref: P2017/2173/FUL and dated 24/08/2017 for "Partial demolition of existing car park annexe.  Erection of a first floor extension and internal alterations to the existing structure to facilitate conversion of the existing ancillary car park internal plant and storage areas (B1 use) into offices (B1 use).  Installation of new plant equipment on the roof.  Provision of new refuse storage facilities and associated works." The S73 application seeks permission to remove the cycle parking serving the offices within the "main" Finwell House building that were previously approved within the rear Annexe building to Finwell house (a former car park), so that the Main Building and Annexe are functionally independent. A new bin store is also proposed to be introduced in the courtyard area.
